title: Placebo Effect of Religion - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/24/19
itunes:title: Placebo Effect of Religion - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/24/19
description:
Guest host Ian Punnett and an open lines caller debate whether there is a placebo effect with religious faith, which could make a positive impact on life even if it is not based on facts.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
